item.title: 国际货币基金组织警告：特朗普的贸易战动摇了金融体系的支柱
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）警告说，唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战正威胁着全球金融稳定，而自2008年危机以来，全球金融稳定一直是银行和保险公司的安全保障，该组织敦促政策制定者加强其行业的防御能力。【原文：President Donald Trump’s trade war is threatening the global financial stability that’s kept banks and insurers safe since the 2008 crisis, the International Monetary Fund warned, as it urged policymakers to bolster their industries’ defenses.】

item.title: 特斯拉董事会因马斯克的关注而遭到州财务主管的抨击
item.description: 美国八个州的财政部长给特斯拉公司董事会写了一封公开信，质疑该公司的发展方向以及埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）对其日益严峻的挑战的关注程度。【原文：The treasurers of eight US states have written an open letter to Tesla Inc.’s board of directors questioning the direction of the company and the level of attention Elon Musk is paying to its mounting challenges.】

item.title: 格林称，英国央行应考虑在未来冲击期间采取更小规模的量化宽松政策
item.description: 英国央行利率制定者梅根-格林（Megan Greene）表示，由于在大流行病期间大量购买债券的做法受到批评，未来可能会以更小规模和更有针对性的方式使用量化宽松政策。【原文：Bank of England rate-setter Megan Greene said quantitative easing could be used in a smaller and more targeted way in the future amid criticism of its vast bond buying during the pandemic.】

item.description: 由于投资者在等待特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.【原文：US stocks managed to bounce from the previous session’s slide as investors await upcoming results from Tesla Inc.】

item.title: 铜陵金属警告美国关税将拖累短期铜业前景
item.description: 铜陵有色金属集团股份有限公司（Tongling Nonferrous Metals Group Co.【原文：Tongling Nonferrous Metals Group Co. said US tariffs will be a drag on copper in the short term, though it remains confident about the long-term growth trend underpinned by demand from the tech industry.】

item.title: 景顺集团和霸菱集团将为日常投资者提供私人信贷服务
item.description: Invesco Ltd. 正与 MassMutual 的资产管理部门合作，向普通投资者出售私人信贷投资，成为最新一家深入拓展另类资产市场的传统资金管理公司。【原文：Invesco Ltd. is teaming up with MassMutual’s asset-management arm to sell private credit investments to everyday investors, becoming the latest traditional money manager to expand deeper into the market for alternative assets.】

item.title: 高盛薪酬之争取决于首席执行官是银行家还是私募市场巨头
item.description: 本周，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc. ）要求股东支持为其最高层的两位高管发放 1.6 亿美元的特别奖金，希望投资者能够同意，该公司远不止是一家声名显赫的投资银行。【原文：As Goldman Sachs Group Inc. asks shareholders this week to back $160 million in special bonuses for its top two executives, the hope is that investors will agree that the firm is far more than a storied investment bank.】

item.title: 非洲黄金出口国和石油进口国窥见一线希望
item.description: 在非洲地区应对唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战和冻结美国援助的影响之际，黄金的飙升和油价的下滑为一些非洲国家带来了难得的提振。【原文：Surging gold and the slide in oil prices are offering some African countries a rare boost, as the region copes with the fallout from President Donald Trump’s trade war and freeze on US aid.】

item.title: 穆迪下调盈利展望，公司正努力应对波动性问题
item.description: 穆迪公司（Moody's Corp.）下调了今年的利润指导，因为该公司准备应对更多的市场剧烈波动，这些波动甚至动摇了相对平静的企业债务世界。【原文：Moody’s Corp. lowered its profit guidance for the year as the firm prepares for more wild market swings like those that have shaken even the relatively placid world of corporate debt.】

item.title: 比尔-哈尼奇的佩科尼奇对冲基金四月因空头上涨 13
item.description: 适时的卖空和对防御性交易的偏好，推动 Peconic Partners 对冲基金在 4 月份迄今为止上涨了 13%，延续了自 2020 年初以来的丰厚回报。【原文：Well-timed short sales and a penchant for defensive trades pushed the Peconic Partners hedge fund up 13% so far in April, extending a sizzling run of returns since the start of 2020.】

item.title: 乌克兰与对冲基金领导的集团就权证改革展开会谈
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，乌克兰和偿付与经济增长挂钩的债务工具的持有者正在开始谈判，以重组下个月到期的一笔付款。【原文：Ukraine and the holders of debt instruments with payouts linked to economic growth are starting talks to restructure a payment due next month, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 哈佛大学斯坦切娃因税收政策研究荣获青年经济学家奖
item.description: 哈佛大学教授斯蒂芬妮-斯坦切娃（Stefanie Stantcheva）因研究税收和补贴对私人决策的影响而荣获 2025 年约翰-贝茨-克拉克奖章青年经济学家奖。【原文：Harvard University Professor Stefanie Stantcheva won the 2025 John Bates Clark Medal young economist award for her work on the impact of taxes and subsidies on private decisions.】

item.title: 关税冲击后，国际货币基金组织对英国前景的下调幅度超过欧洲同行
item.description: 由于美国关税可能对全球经济造成 "重大冲击"，国际货币基金组织对英国未来两年经济增长前景的下调幅度超过了任何主要欧洲国家。【原文：The International Monetary Fund cut UK growth prospects over the next two years by more than any leading European nation as US tariffs threaten a “major shock” to the global economy.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织下调全球经济增长预测，称下行风险占主导地位
item.description: 国际货币基金组织大幅下调了对今明两年世界经济增长的预测，并警告说，随着美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税引发全球贸易战，经济前景可能进一步恶化。【原文：The International Monetary Fund sharply lowered its forecasts for world growth for this year and next, warning the outlook could deteriorate further as US President Donald Trump’s tariffs spark a global trade war.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织就 2026 年及以后中国和美国的贸易战后果发出警告
item.description: 国际货币基金组织表示，贸易战的最新升级有可能使中国和美国蒙受损失，而这种损失在今年之后只会变得更糟。【原文：The International Monetary Fund said the latest escalation in the trade war risks saddling China and the US with losses that would only get worse after this year.】

item.title: 特朗普之子的比特币开采合作伙伴曾与监管机构发生冲突
item.description: 为了进军加密货币挖矿行业，埃里克-特朗普和小唐纳德-特朗普正在与高管合作，后者曾在投资者的支持下成立了一家矿商，而投资者则卷入了一起非法的一分钱股票抽水和倾销行动。【原文：To break into the cryptocurrency mining industry, Eric Trump and Donald Trump Jr. are teaming up with executives who previously founded a miner with the backing of investors implicated in an illegal penny-stock pump-and-dump operation.】

item.title: 考生选择专业，CFA 最终通过率升至 49
item.description: 特许金融分析师最后一级考试的通过率略有上升，但仍低于历史平均水平。【原文：The pass rate for the final level of the chartered financial analyst exam — the first in which test-takers were given a choice of specialty — rose slightly while remaining below the historic average.】

item.title: 特朗普震荡美国市场，新兴市场股市扩大领先上证 500 指数的优势
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的政策冲击正在使风险情绪向有利于新兴市场股票的方向倾斜，导致新兴市场股票在投资者关注当地增长和盈利的情况下，取得了 16 年来超越美股的最大表现。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s policy shocks are tilting risk sentiment in favor of emerging-market equities, leading to their biggest outperformance in 16 years over US stocks as investors focus on local growth and earnings.】

item.title: CEZ 即将向捷克国家出售核电项目
item.description: 据知情人士透露，东欧最大的电力生产商 CEZ AS 即将向捷克政府出售一个核电项目。【原文：CEZ AS, the biggest traded electricity producer in eastern Europe, is close to selling a nuclear project to the Czech government, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税政策有可能将柬埔寨进一步推向中国的怀抱
item.description:
一条巨大的运河凸显了北京在柬埔寨的深度投资，而此时美国正在后撤，使得这个东南亚国家平衡关系的空间越来越小。【原文：

A massive canal highlights Beijing’s deep investment in Cambodia just as the US is pulling back, leaving the Southeast Asian nation with less room to balance ties.

item.title: 欧洲央行行长卡齐米尔预计未来几个月通胀率将达到 2% 的目标
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员彼得-卡齐米尔（Peter Kazimir）表示，欧洲中央银行将在未来几个月内实现其通胀目标，但面对高度的不确定性，必须保持谨慎。【原文：The European Central Bank will achieve its inflation goal in the months ahead, though must remain circumspect in the face of high uncertainty, according to Governing Council member Peter Kazimir.】

item.title: 特朗普贸易战提振墨西哥航运公司增长前景
item.description: 奥斯卡-德尔奎托-奎瓦斯（Oscar Del Cueto Cuevas）位于墨西哥城的办公室里挂满了来自三个国家的超大旗帜：一面来自美国，一面来自墨西哥，最后一面来自加拿大。【原文：Oversized flags from three countries dominate Oscar Del Cueto Cuevas’ office in Mexico City: one from the US, another from Mexico and the last from Canada.】

item.title: 惠誉称：巴基斯坦将允许卢比逐步走弱
item.description: 据惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）称，随着经济发展步伐加快，巴基斯坦央行将允许卢比逐步走软，以控制经常账户压力。【原文：Pakistan’s central bank will allow the rupee to gradually weaken to manage pressures on the current account as the economy gains pace, according to Fitch Ratings.】

item.title: 哈里伯顿公布 2022 年以来最低销售额后下跌
item.description: 全球最大的液压致裂服务提供商哈里伯顿公司（Halliburton Co.【原文：Halliburton Co., the world’s largest provider of hydraulic fracturing services, fell sharply in early trading after posting first-quarter results that gave investors little insight into the company’s outlook amid lower crude prices.】

item.description:
与大多数行业相比，公用事业类股票的风险可能较低，但它们仍可能受到饥渴的数据中心支出放缓的影响。【原文：

item.title: 英国央行格林称央行独立性 "绝对关键
item.description: 英国央行利率制定者梅根-格林（Megan Greene）表示，央行保持其独立性 "绝对至关重要"，但她坚称，她担心美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对美联储的攻击不会重演。【原文：Bank of England rate-setter Megan Greene said it’s “absolutely crucial” that central banks retain their independence, but insisted she fears no echoing of President Donald Trump’s attacks on the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 沙特咖啡连锁店和餐馆 IPO 面临消费者实力考验
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯的一系列食品和饮料公司正在准备出售新股，这些交易将受到消费者前景的影响，因为该国经济正在努力应对油价长期走低的前景。【原文：A list of Saudi Arabian food and beverage firms are readying new share sales in deals that will be exposed to the outlook of consumers in an economy that is grappling with the prospect of lower-for-longer oil prices.】

item.title: 泰国总理在联盟出现裂痕之际排除了内阁重组的可能性
item.description: 泰国总理白通丹-西那瓦（Paetongtarn Shinawatra）排除了即将进行内阁重组的可能性，因为有报道称她所在的执政党与其最大的联盟伙伴之间的裂痕日益加深。【原文：Thailand’s Prime Minister Paetongtarn Shinawatra has ruled out an imminent cabinet shakeup amid reports of a growing rift between her ruling party and its biggest coalition partner.】

item.title: 特斯拉面临 "荒废之年 "的风险 如果没有新的盈利故事
item.description: 特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc. ）周二发布财报，利润下滑，而人们期待已久的自动驾驶汽车的首次亮相还有几个月才会到来。【原文：Tesla Inc. investors reeling from one of the stock’s worst-ever quarters are once again looking for Elon Musk to inject excitement back into the firm when it reports results Tuesday, as profits slip and the much-awaited debut of a self-driving car remains months away.】
